title: LIVE! in Chicago: "The Winds of Harmattan" by Nnedi Okorafor
description: A young woman discovers her destiny as a Windseeker. Recorded on the LeVar Burton Reads LIVE! tour. With accompaniment by the legendary instrumentalist and kalimba player Kahil El'Zabar, and featuring a conversation with Nnedi Okorafor. This story appears in Okorafor's collection KABU KABU.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
